sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SPSEOUtilsSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Service Portal SEO Util methods</description>
        <name>SPSEOUtilsSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SPSEOUtilsSNC = Class.create();
SPSEOUtilsSNC.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {},
	
    type: 'SPSEOUtilsSNC'
};

SPSEOUtilsSNC.getPortalId = function() {
	return new GlideSPUtil().getPortal().getValue("sys_id");
};

SPSEOUtilsSNC.getPageRecordWithPageRoute = function(pageId, portalId, preventReRoute) {
	return new GlideSPUtil().getPageRecordWithPageRoute(pageId, portalId, preventReRoute);
};

SPSEOUtilsSNC.getHumanReadableUrlForCurrentRequest = function() {
	return new GlideSPUtil().getHumanReadableUrl();
};

SPSEOUtilsSNC.getHumanReadableUrl = function(pageGR, queryString) {
	return new GlideSPUtil().getHumanReadableUrl(pageGR, queryString);
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-11-08 14:22:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2aaeac25770311103b0efc3eaf5a994a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SPSEOUtilsSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">3c3878203cf1311068bcf327dfe37f0b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2aaeac25770311103b0efc3eaf5a994a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-11-21 11:08:15</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
